item.text: Both players have Spell Damage +2.

item.name: Axe Flinger
item.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Warrior Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.
item.flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Warrior Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.

item.name: Blackwing
item.text: Hero Power Summon a 5/4 Dragonkin. Get a new Hero Power.

item.name: Blackwing
item.text: Hero Power Summon a 3/1 Dragonkin. Get a new Hero Power.

item.name: Blackwing Corruptor
item.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Maloriak in the Hidden Laboratory.
item.flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Maloriak in the Hidden Laboratory.

item.name: Blackwing Technician
item.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Baron Geddon in Molten Core.
item.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Baron Geddon in Molten Core.

item.text: Increased Attack.

item.name: Burning Adrenaline
item.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero.

item.name: Chromaggus
item.text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing Blackwing Lair.
item.flavor: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing Blackwing Lair.

item.name: Chromatic Dragonkin
item.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2/+2.

item.name: Chromatic Mutation
item.text: Transform a minion into a 2/2 Chromatic Dragonkin.

item.name: Chromatic Prototype
item.text: Taunt

item.name: Core Rager
item.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Highlord Omokk in Blackrock Spire.
item.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Highlord Omokk in Blackrock Spire.

item.name: Corrupted Egg
item.text: When this minion has 4 or more Health, it hatches.

item.name: Corrupted Egg
item.text: When this minion has 5 or more Health, it hatches.

item.name: Dark Iron Bouncer
item.text: Always wins Brawls.

item.name: Dark Iron Skulker
item.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Rogue Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.
item.flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Rogue Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.

item.name: Dark Iron Spectator
item.text: Taunt

item.name: Demonwrath
item.text: Deal $2 damage to all non-Demon minions.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Warlock Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.
item.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Warlock Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.

item.name: DIE, INSECT!
item.text: Deal $8 damage to a random enemy.

item.name: DIE, INSECT!
item.text: Hero Power Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.

item.name: DIE, INSECTS!
item.text: Hero Power Deal 8 damage to a random enemy. TWICE.

item.text: Hero Power Summon Gyth. Get a new Hero Power.

item.text: Hero Power Summon Gyth. Get a new Hero Power.

item.name: Draconic Power
Dragon Consort
item.text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating General Drakkisath in Blackrock Spire.
item.flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating General Drakkisath in Blackrock Spire.

item.name: Dragon Egg
item.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Rend Blackhand in Blackrock Spire.
item.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Rend Blackhand in Blackrock Spire.

item.name: Dragon's Breath
item.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Mage Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.
item.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy? It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Mage Class Challenge in Blackrock Mountain.

item.name: Dragon's Might
item.text: Costs (3) less this turn.

item.name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
item.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Nefarian in the Hidden Laboratory.
item.flavor: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Nefarian in the Hidden Laboratory.

item.name: Dragonteeth
item.text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, gain +1 Attack.

item.name: Drakkisath's Command
item.text: Destroy a minion. Gain 10 Armor.

item.name: Drakonid Crusher
item.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Atramedes in the Hidden Laboratory.
item.flavor: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humaniod. But, like, why?
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Atramedes in the Hidden Laboratory.

item.name: Druid of the Flame
item.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Garr in Molten Core.
item.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Garr in Molten Core.

item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing Blackrock Depths.
item.flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Lord Victor Nefarius in Blackwing Lair.
item.flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

item.name: Flamewaker
item.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.

item.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they donâ€™t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

item.name: Gang Up
item.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating the Dark Iron Arena in Blackrock Depths.
item.flavor: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

item.name: Rend Blackhand
item.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing Blackrock Spire.
item.flavor: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing Blackrock Spire.

item.name: Resurrect
item.text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Emperor Thaurissan in Blackrock Depths.
item.flavor: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Emperor Thaurissan in Blackrock Depths.

item.name: Revenge
item.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $3 damage instead.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Razorgore in Blackwing Lair.
item.flavor: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Razorgore in Blackwing Lair.
